name: MAD
description: MAD is a memecoin on the Avalanche blockchain which came into existence as a result of its developers experimentation. All this happened Dec 24th, on Christmas Eve after playing around with Thirdweb. The token was launched on mainnet in a few clicks using their default token contract. Then it took another click to provide it's initial Liquidity on Trader Joe. From this, as a trusted member of the Avax Community and an esteemed Builder in the ecosystem, the developer decided to take this meme seriously and built a website and everything the community asked for to further develop it He's now the hostage of his own mistake while the meme which shouldn't have existed in the first place continues its adventures, he's now $MAD forever. This token will be the fuel of the MAD ecosystem (Staking, Merchandizing and NFT Collection) As a meme it has the goal to share the story of how it was created to empower everyone to do the same "mistake"
